description: You have reached the top of this staircase, and the third floor of
this mansion.  You can really hear the rain outside now, as the room
is just above your head.  The hallway goes south from here, and leads
to more of the third floor.
14266.name: Spiral Staircase

description: The hallway reaches down the main part of the fourth floor.  Some doors
and smaller hallways branch off, leading to their own rooms.  The massive
jade walls seems to transfer light before you, creating a wonderful illusion
of motion.  The woven rug defiantly leads the way deeper into the fourth
floor.
14106.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: The alley continues, with more green stone buildings.  There are many
puddles forming on the ground around your feet, as the rain continues to
fall.  Flashes of lightning fill the sky, and the rumble of thunder follows
soon after.
14128.name: Alleyway

description: You walk along the north south western wall road.  To the north
you can see the northwestern guard tower, and just south of here lies
the western gates.  To the east you can see the city expanding in
front of you, in all its entirety.
14048.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You are walking inside a large underground building, which houses a
vast storeyard.  There are piles and stacks of crates and boxes as far
as the eye can see.  Many people walk around this area working on who
knows what.
14163.name: Underground Stockyards

description: You have reached the end of this warehouse.  There are piles of
boxes and crates all around you, and you begin to wonder what they are
for.  Voices can be heard all around you, and the sounds of the
outside storm can be heard as well.
14330.name: Stone-Walled Warehouse

description: You are walking down a pathway that leads to a large enclosed
square.  This section of the city is where the slums are located, and
the condition of the nearby buildings really shows it.  The rain is
pouring down around you, and puddles are forming at your feet.
14319.name: Pathway to a Large Square

description: You stand in a large warehouse with stone walls.  There are crates
stacked up over your head, and seem to reach all the way to the
celing.  You stand in a large warehouse with stone walls.  There are
crates stacked up over your head, and seem to reach all the way to the
ceiling.  The exit is back south through the door, and there's a hatch
in the floor.
14142.name: Stone-Walled Warehouse

description: This valley path leads steeply down toward the valley floor.  You
get a strong feeling of insignificance as you stare around you at this
valley.  The city in this valley's center seems to be ever-growing as
you near it.
14371.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: You are standing below the southeast guard tower, which watches and
protects the city from the outside.  Here you are shielded from the
rain that is falling, but not from the soft wind and sound of thunder.
Also the sounds of the city can be heard, as the cityfolk go about
their business through this continual storm.
14075.name: Southeast Corner of the Wall

description: The alleyway continues on an east-west direction, and has bends in
it on both ends.  Lanterns hung on the sides of buildings light your
way, as the rain falls down from above, creating puddles at your feet.
14156.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: The main street continues, stretching across the city.  East lies the
famous City Center, and west heads towards the western gate.  The brick
street goes on west and east.
14053.name: Main Street

description: You have finally reached the floor of this massive valley.  Sounds
of wildlife can be heard all around, and the rain still falls from
overhead.  The city to the north looms over you, making you feel very
insignificant.
14374.name: The Valley Floor

description: You stand in a small room, with a glowing red circle set in the
center of the floor.  There are tomes and scrolls on a small table to
the west.  This seems to be where the {8Shadow Guild{x mages bring their
comrades in.
14387.name: {8Shadow Guild{x Summoning Room

description: You have entered a large entrance, which leads into one of the
largest churches you've ever seen.  The walls reach high above you,
and meet at a point at the top.  Stained glass windows face all
directions, and organ music can be heard from within.
14225.name: Entranceway to the Church

description: You have entered a large kitchen, with pots and pans hanging from
the ceiling.  There is a large island counter in the middle of the
room, and all along the outside walls lie other counters and ovens.  A
huge stone fireplace is set in the northern wall.  Lamps light the
walls here, and the floor is made of a fine stone.  The only apparent
exit is back east, where you came from.
14140.name: Kitchen

description: You are inside a large underground builing that houses a gigantic
store yard.  There are crates and boxes everywhere, along with many
people who look unhappy to see visitors.  Back north lies the way out.
14161.name: Underground Stockyards

description: The street forks here, and turns to the north and south.  The wall itself
is quite high, reaching above some of the smaller buildings.  Back east lies
the city center, and north and south lead to more of this massive city.
14049.name: Western Gate

description: You are walking down a very well lit alleyway.  There are lanterns
mounted on each side of the street, along with a few street lamps
coming up from the ground.  The splatter of rain is heard all around
you, as the storm overhead rages on.
14195.name: Well Lit Alleyway

description: You walk down a large hallway, which travels down this floor of the
Imperial Palace.  Beautiful paintings cover the walls, and a nice
carpet lines the floor.  You can hear the sound of rain from overhead.
14350.name: Hallway in the Palace

description: You are walking along the main street, which connects the city
center with the souther gates.  All around you the noises of the city
can be heard, and the faint sound of wilderness can be heard as well.
Small puddles of rain have formed along this road, and splash up at
you as more rain continues to fall.
14004.name: Southern Main Street

description: You are walking along the southern wall of the guild square.
Sounds of battles can be heard from the rest of the square, along with
the sounds of the above ground storm.  The square continues all around
you but south.
14211.name: Southern Wall of Guild Square

description: You are walking along the northernmost road in Darrowmere.  Just
west of here lies the northern gate, and far to the east lies the
northeastern guard tower.  The sound of rain pattering at your feet
can be heard slightly over the road of bustling people in the city.
14035.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You have reached the end of this hallway.  At this end, there is a
large spiral staircase leading up to what looks like the next floor.
A beautiful carpet covers the floor here, and follows the stairs right
up.
14250.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You stand in a large meeting room, where members of the {8Shadow
Guild{x meet and converse together.  This building itself is very large,
which suggests many more rooms.  Back south lies the entranceway, and
all around you lie possible exits.
14176.name: Main hall of the {8Shadow Guild{x

description: You stand on the southern wall road.  This road goes east and west,
with two large guard towers on either end.  Sounds of the city can be
heard, as the dense areas are just north of you.
14060.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You continues to advance closer to the front of the church, as you
are walking up the main row.  Pews line this row, and to the east a
large altar can be seen.  Organ music fills the room around you, as
the rain pours down over the church here.
14227.name: Inside the Church

description: You walk down the main hall in the second floor.  Voices can be
heard all around you, as people within this structure talk amongst
themselves.  Lanterns light your path as you walk down this alley.
14254.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You have reached the end of this narrow alley.  It stops before a
small building, which appears to be some sort of shop.  The rest of
the city towers over you, and makes you feel very small.
14327.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: You descend even farther into the black morass that looms under
you.  The staircase below your feet seems very sturdy, which is good
as the base of this place cannot be seen.  It appears that the walls
of this cavern are far away from you, as you cannot hear them, and
echoes are fairly distant.
14409.name: Staircase to Oblivion

description: You are walking along the southern wall road.  To either end lies a
guard tower, and just west of here lie the southern gates.  Buildings
line the road opposite from the wall, and people bustle about their
business in them.  The rain continues to fall down around your feet.
14081.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You are walking along the eastern wall road, which follows the
eastern wall very closely.  Here you can hear the sounds of both the
city and the wilderness, each contrasting one another.  The rain falls
continually around you, and flashes of lightning ignite the sky.
14074.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: {gYou walk in the very dense forest of this city, where the plant
life has begun to overtake the city.  Rain still finds its way down to
you, despite the thick treetops above you.  {x
14280.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You are in a large room, with adequate furnishings and a very good
view of some kind of arena.  Light fills the room from an unseen
source and a large couch faces the arena.  There is also a leather
chair set a few feet above the floor, which faces the arena as well.
14386.name: Entertainment Room

description: You continue to walk inside the vast mithril caves.  These caves
sink deep into the planet's surface, and lead toward unknown
territory.  The walls here are green, and made completely of stone.
14359.name: Mithril Caves

description: This room contains a large circular altar barely above the floor.  A
strong smell of incense fills the air, along with the chanting of healers.
Very little light streams from the stained glass window, creating a darker
atmosphere in here.  Back east lies the rest of the temple.
14094.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple{x

description: You have entered a small room, with a fine coat of flour on the
floor.  There are shelves of breads and rolls and everything else
baked that you can imagine.  There is a glass counter on the eastern
wall, and the baker stands in a small back room with the oven.
14171.name: Bakery

description: The square runs north and east; a perfect channel for the local
businesses.  The cityfolk walk about, going into and out of the many
buildings.  The stone path of the square beckons you to continue on it's
exact path.
14083.name: Common Square

description: You stand at the southern gate of Darrowmere.  There is a drastic
weather change from the rest of this area; here it seems to be in a
constant state of storm.  Rain falls softly around you, and the rumble
of thunder can be heard in the distance.  Regardless of the storm,
people bustle about their business, trading, bartering, and carrying
out their lives.  No one in this city seem to be affected by the state
of the weather, as if it's a natural setting.  The city itself looms
before you, and seems to expand before your very eyes.  Most of the
buildings are constructed from a beautiful green stone, and the
streets are of a fine cobble.  A very important looking building
towers over the rest of the city to the northeast.  From here roads
lead north, east, and west.
14001.name: Southern Gate

description: The main road goes north and south, with a small alleyway reaching to the
west.  This alley seems to lead into the dense city, whereas this road leads
to more open areas.  Buildings line the sides of the road, and seem to tower
above you.
14013.name: Northern Main Street

description: You walk out onto the balcony, which surrounds the tower in the
church.  The wind blows softly, and rain pours down around you.  It's
pretty dark, and the light you carry really helps the walk.
14402.name: On the balcony

description: You stand in a room above the Pub.  There are a few living commodities
about the room, and an oil lamp sits on a table.  A large woven rug covers
the floor, except where the stairway juts out of it.  A small window is on
the northern wall, revealing the dense part of Darrowmere.  Streaks of rain
run down the window, making it slightly difficult to see detail out of it.
14133.name: Upstairs Loft

description: Here lies the southern entrance to the common square.  It is here that
the local shops run their establishments.  The cobblestone path leads north
into the city center, and east and west to the other parts of the common
square.  The slight hum of cityfolk fills the air around you, almost
entrancing you into getting involved.
14007.name: Common Square

description: You are walking along the northernmost wall in the guild square.
Sounds of fighting can be heard all around you, as well as the faint
sound of the aboveground storm.
14217.name: Northern Wall of Guild Square

description: This road that you are walking along follows the northern wall.  To
the east lies the northern gates, and to the west lies the northwest
corner of the city.  The dense city expands to the south, and to the
north you can hear the sounds of wilderness.
14040.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You are standing under the northeast guard tower, which shelters
the city of Darrowmere from the wilderness.  The sound of footsteps
can be heard overhead, along with the patter of rain on the guard
tower roof.  Southwest of here lies the entire city, in all its
greatness.
14029.name: Northeast Corner of the Wall

description: This road leads north and south, connecting the northwestern and
southwestern guard towers, as well as following the western wall.
Some noise can be heard from outside the wall, probably animals
roaming about in the wilderness.
14067.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You stand on the eastern wall road, which parallels the eastern
wall.  At either end of this wall lies a guard tower, and just north
of here lie the eastern gates.  The rain continues to fall around you,
creating a few puddles at your feet.
14069.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You have entered a medium sized building, with wooden floors and
green stone walls.  A bar fills the center of the room, and some
tables with chairs line the walls.  Stools go around the bar, some
with half drunk people in them and others empty.  Oil lamps cover the
walls, with a couple on each one.  A stairway leads up to another
floor in the back corner.  Another leads down into a dark, smoky area.
14132.name: Pub

description: The alley reaches into the depths of the inner city, which contains
countless buildings and shops.  The alley itself is very nicely structured,
with green stone walls on the buildings and stone pathways.  Several doors
lead into buildings unknown.
14130.name: Alleyway

description: Before you lie two massive wooden doors leading north.  They look
very important, and most likely lead into an even larger room.  Back
south lies the rest of this hallway, which eventually intersects the
main hallway of the Palace.
14138.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x

description: You stand on a break in the stairs, which allows you to get off at
the second floor.  The walls are still covered with beautiful
tapestries and paintings, and the room is lit with a hanging lantern.
14252.name: Spiral Staircase in the Mansion

description: You are walking down a wide hallway that takes you around the
ground floor of this mansion.  The sound of rain outside can be heard,
along with strikes of thunder.
14248.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You walk along the east west southern wall road.  To the direct
west you can see the southwest guard tower.  More to the east the
southern gates can be seen.  The city expands before you to the
northeast, and seems to be constantly growing.
14061.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You have entered a very dark room, with almost no light.  Voices
are heard around you, but it's hard to make out where they're coming
from.  This is the room in the guild where jobs are planned and
assigned, and where practically the entire organized crime of
Darrowmere is run.
14185.name: Dark Room

description: You have reached the end of this large building.  There is a desk
against the wall, and a large guard sits behind it.  This room is
where the entire law of Darrowmere is centralized.
14339.name: Cityguard Headquarters

description: You have reached a sharp bend in the hallway.  Lanterns line the
walls, providing adequate light for you to see.  You can hear the
patter of the rain coming down from outside, along with an occasional
thunder strike.
14255.name: Bend in the Hallway

description: {gYou have reached a point in the forest where it meets a very tall
building.  Just to your west lies the infamous Imperial Palace, the
capital building of Emperor Teron.  The vegetation seems to have
stopped consuming the city, but it has begun to grow up the wall here.
{x
14282.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You have reached the end of this short hallway.  A large set of
doors is to the east, which must lead to someplace important.
Lanterns on the walls and ceiling guide your path, as you walk down
this hall.
14269.name: End of the Hallway

description: You have reached the base of this small staircase.  It is very dark
down here, and the sound of whips cracking can be heard very well.
The only exit here is to the east.
14313.name: Bottom of the Spiral Staircase

description: You continue to climb up this massive mithril ledge.  Water runs
down the side, making it very hard to scale this.  It is impossible to
lower yourself back down, so you must continue going up.
14365.name: Climbing the Ledge

description: You decend deeper into the mithril caves, that sink into the
surface.  Soft gusts of wind can still be felt, although they are not
very strong.  Dripping water can be heard from a distance.
14358.name: Mithril Caves

description: This road goes east and west, which follows the southern wall
closely.  The wall is fairly high, and has a tower ay both ends.
Sounds from the outside can be heard, as the deep forests are just
outside this great wall.
14059.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You are walking along the third floor of this huge church.  Organ
music plays loudly, which almost drowns out the patter of the rain
outside.  This floor goes east and west only.
14241.name: Third Floor of the Church

description: You are walking along the southern wall road.  To the direct north
some buildings line the road, and further north lies the rest of the
city.  The rain has not let up at all since your arrival here, and the
rumble of thunder tells of a storm that is heading this way.
14078.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: The path ends, and leads into a large entrance hall.  It is the beginning
of the great Imperial Palace, the chief building to the great Emperor.  This
building marks the center of the Emperor's realms.  The hallways of this
structure seem to be made from the finest jade, floors covered in the
greatest rugs in the lands.  This truly is the pinnacle of the Emperor's
greatest accomplishments.
14087.name: Entrance Hall

description: You have entered a medium sized bedroom, with modest furniture
suitable for a guest to this mansion.  A lantern lights this room, and
a window to the north shows the storm outside.
14260.name: Bedroom

description: You walk along the east west southern wall road.  The road itself
is made of a fine cobblestone, and the buildings along it are of a
beautiful green stone.  North of here the city almost expands before
your eyes, as it looks to be ever growing.
14080.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: The street nears it's western end, as it reaches the west wall.  Some
street lamps line the road, flickering around in the breeze.  Large
buildings can be seen to the northeast, probably ones of mass importance.
14050.name: Western Main Street

description: Here lies the northeastern common square.  Shops are to the north and
east.  The stone road leads back to the west and south.  The wind picks up
slightly, blowing a bit of dust across the street.
14085.name: Common Square

description: You are walking along the southern wall of the guild square.  Here
you can practice your skills, and gain experience in fighting.  Others
walk around here, battling with the roaming monsters.
14209.name: Southern Wall of Guild Square

description: Here lies the great Temple of Crusades, the largest center of healing and
worship in the area.  A large rug leads in all directions, and upwards is a
vast ceiling.  Pillars line the walls, which hold up this massive structure
from collapse.  A warm presence makes itself known here.
14089.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple{x

description: {8You stand in a huge room, circular in shape with only one exit.  A
high {^l{6eather chai{^r{8 is raised above the floor, which can rotate and
look out the windows.  The windows themselves line the walls here, and
reveal the entire city of {GD{garrowmer{Ge{8, capital city of the Empire.  The
floor and walls are made completely of metal, and the windows are made
of some durable {$g{4lasstee{$l{8.  This room is truly the place where you can
see everything.  {x
14385.name: {$L{4or{$d {!T{1eron'{!s {$T{4hron{$e R{4oo{$m{x

description: You stand before a large stone building, which houses Darrowmere's
dead.  Few windows are on the walls of this building, and the building
itself looks very sterile.
14285.name: Entrance to the Morgue

description: You walk in a very large casino, housed completely on the third
floor of the Imperial Palace.  Slot machines line the walls, and some
dice tables fill the room.  People walk around here, getting drunk and
blowing their money.
14345.name: Imperial Casino

description: The hallway continues, stretching down the center of the first floor.
The walls and ceiling are perfect, not a single imperfection anywhere.  The
lighting is fairly bright, with lights on the walls.  A wonderfully woven
rug covers the entire floor, adding to the beauty of the palace.
14095.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are walking in the large sewers that lie below Darrowmere.
There is no way out, and this is the last place you are going to see.
14395.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: Notice:  This Questmaster is only for purchasing quest items... to receive actual quests, visit one of the many shopkeepers in town.
You stand in a large room, with a large chair above the floor.
Some windows line the walls, showing the outside storm, and a huge rug
coveres the center of the floor.  A sign is on the wall, with the
heading: {GQuest{x.   The only exit is back down.
14388.name: Room of the Questmaster

description: You are following the east west road in the northern end of the
city.  Guards patrol the wall above you, and noises from the outside
can be heard.  The city towers above you from the south, and various
noises from it can be heard easily.
14039.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You have entered a large office, which is where the legal and
financial side of the stockyards are taken care of.  A large desk lies
against the eastern wall, and the manager of these stockyards sits
behind it.  He looks at you with a cocked eye when you enter.
14170.name: Underground Office

description: You walk along a very narrow alleyway, which leads into a dense
section of the city.  Some laterns hang outside doors along this
alley, but most of those doors look to be locked.  The alley continues
on into the city, leading to other buildings and shops.
14147.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: The hallway comes to a close here, and opens up into a large outside
platform.  The downpour of rain can be heard, and the wind has calmed down
for the time being.  There is little light coming from the opening, due to
the overcast skies.
14119.name: Hallway

description: You are traveling down a very narrow alley, with almost no light.
The shadows grow deep here, and you wonder what may lurk in them.  The
alley bends to the west here, and also continues to the north.
14326.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: You walk in the city morgue.  Large metal doors line the walls,
which makes the walls look like giant filing cabinets.  The air is
slightly chilled here, and the room is very sterile.
14289.name: City Morgue

description: You stand in the small upstairs of this building.  Trees have grown
up through the floor, and the walls are covered with moss.  Cracks in
the ceiling allow rain to fall in here, creating a very damp
atmosphere.
14302.name: Upstairs in the Crumbled Building

description: You stand in the back room of the Darrowmere pet shop.  There are
animals everywhere, along with troughs to feed them with.  The only
exit is back south through the locked door.
14332.name: Back Room

description: You have climbed a set of wooden stairs, which leads to the second
floor of this church.  Organ music can still be heard, and seems to be
getting a bit louder.  The church itself is getting smaller as it
reaches a point at the top.
14236.name: Second Floor of the Church

description: You seem to have entered some kind of large stockyard, which is
below Darrowmere's surface.  Crates are stacked everywhere, and you
wonder what kind of operation is going on down here.  Many people
bustle about, working on machines and packing boxes.
14160.name: Underground Stockyards

description: You have entered a smaller room in this underground storehouse.
There are still many crates piled up, along with workers packing them.
All around you the sound of machinery can be heard.
14168.name: Underground Stockyards

description: You walk down a narrow pathway, that leads to a large square and an
even large building.  Your feet splash in the newly formed puddles on
the path, as the rain continues to fall from overhead.  The rumble of
thunder reminds you of the storm above.
14320.name: Pathway to a Large Square

description: You stand in a small, narrow hallway that reaches away from the
stockyards.  Farther to the south lies a large door, which could be
almost anything.  The sound of machinery grows distant here, as you
walk farther away from the stockyards.
14169.name: Hallway

description: You walk down a large hallway.  The walls are made of solid wood, and the
floor is a fine granite.  The faint trickle of rain can be heard, along with
some short mad gusts of wind.  The outside must be getting closer.
14118.name: Hallway

description: You have reached the top of this huge ledge.  You cannot scale back
down it, so you might as well press on.  The sounds of a raging storm
can be heard coming from outside.
14366.name: Atop the Mithril Ledge

description: {8You walk in the dark basement of this mansion.  The air is very
thin, and smells of must and rot.  You can hear footsteps around you,
and wonder what else could be with you in this basement.  {x
14294.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: You are standing in a large hallway, which stretches over the base
floor of this mansion.  Whoever lives here must be very rich.
Tapestries cover the walls, along with an occasional lantern.  The
sound of the rain outside can still be heard.
14247.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You stand in the northern common square, just north of the City Center.
Large buildings tower in the distance, and smaller ones dwell right before
you.  The brick road leads north and south, and the cobblestone square
continues east and west.
14009.name: Common Square

description: You walk along the north south eastern wall road.  This road
follows the eastern wall, which has guard towers on either end.  The
storm overhead makes itself known with rumbles of thunder and a few
flashes of lightning in the cloudy sky.
14027.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You stand in a poorly lit room, most likely some sort of warehouse.  The
faint smell of decaying wood is detectable.  Shadows creep about the room in
an eerie manner.
14131.name: Dark Building

description: You are walking along a very narrow and dark alleyway.  The rain
from above streaks down the sides of the buildings, and puddles form
around your feet.  The city seems to tower over you, as you walk in
the dense sections of this city.
14324.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: You have reached the top floor of this palace.  There are exits in
all directions, except up.  The staircase leads back down to the other
floors.
14383.name: Top Floor of the Imperial Palace

description: You have entered a small bedroom, with only a bed and a chest of
drawers.  You can hear the sounds of the outside storm, and the window
to the south shows how hard the rain is coming down.
14263.name: Bedroom

description: The hallway stretches down to the west, leading to some more rooms.  The
walls are made of pure jade, a sign of how detailed and perfect the builder
wanted this place to be.  A large woven rug travels down the hallway along
with you.
14111.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: Here the main road has almost reached the common square to the
north.  South more lie the southern gates.  The sound of barter and
the murmur of talking can be heard coming from the square up north, as
the cityfolk go about their business.
14006.name: Main Street

description: You walk down a fairly wide hallway, which reaches deeper in the
heart of the {8Shadow Guild{x.  There are emblems of the guild on the
walls, and a beautofully woven carpet on top of the stone floor.
There are lanterns on the walls, which guides your way.
14178.name: Hallway in the {8Shadow Guild{x

description: The hallway continues, leading farther to the west.  Some rooms branch
north and south.  The jade walls are perfect in this room, not a single
scratch or chip.  The stairwell down is back east.
14112.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You stand in the northwestern corner of guild square.  This square
seems like an ideal place for lower level adventurers to hone their
skills, and maybe gain some experience.  The sound of fighting can be
heard all around you.
14204.name: Northwest Corner of Guild Square

description: This area was originally created by:
of [{8The I{7mp{&er{7ia{8l{7, {8Inc.{7]{x
The gentle kiss of the wind presses against your face, as cityfolk and
tourists alike walk about the square.  Small buildings line the outer edges
of the square, with the contrast of taller structures off in the distance.
A gentle roar of trading and barter fills the air, along with the hum of
conversation.  A large stone fountain trickles softly towards the middle of
the square.  The city streets lead in all directions, spanning the city for
as far as the eye can see.
14008.name: City Center

description: You have entered a secret room in this residence.  There is a
waist-high counter going around the edges of the room, and the
bookcase leads back west.  This looks to be someone's private office,
and you should probably not be here.
14337.name: Secret Room

description: You stand before a small spiral staircase that leads down.  Here
you can hear the sounds of people screaming, and the intense sound of
whips cracking.  It does not seem very well lit down there.
14312.name: Spiral Staircase

description: {gYou walk along some very dense forests within this city.  The
treetops almost cover you completely from the rain, but a few drops
make it through.  You can hear noises of wildlife around you, along
with rumbles of thunder from overhead.  {x
14276.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You are scaling up this vast mithril ledge.  It is extremely
difficult to maintain your grasp on the mithril, as water continually
runs down it.  The only exit is to continue up.
14364.name: Climbing the Ledge

description: The hallway comes to an end here, leading to a staircase to the third
floor.  The jade walls and ceiling lightly contrast the woven rug, which
makes it quite beautiful.  There are some side halls and doorways in this
main hall, leading to other rooms.
14100.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: {gYou are walking in the forests in this city.  You can hear sounds
of wildlife all around you, and also the sounds of a storm above you.
The forest continues all around you, spanning over this section of the
city.  {x
14281.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You have entered a large entranceway, which leads to a very small
building.  You are sheltered from the rain here, and it barely
splashes in behind you.  This seems to be a guild where you can
practice and train any skills you may have learned.
14199.name: Entrance to the Guildrooms

description: You continue on this lush path to the valley floor.  Trees loom
over you, and the valley floor itself seems to be down somewhere near
infinity.  You get overwhelmed as you stare down at the floor.
14369.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: You stand in a small room, that is slightly chilled and smells of
fresh fish.  This is where the fisherman sell their catch, which has
been imported from the famous Sea of Swords.
14397.name: Catch of the Day

description: You walk down a very narrow alley, which leads to a dense section
of the city.  There are no lights down this alley, as the only light
comes from the rest of the city.
14321.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  Doors line
the walls, with lanterns between each set of doors, creating adequate
light.  You can hear the sounds of a storm coming from outside.
14257.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: The street continues, leading farther east toward the eastern wall.  A
large structure lies to the north, with large doors connected here at the
street.  The slight rumble of thunder is off in the distance, creating a
nice contrast to the murmur of the townsfolk.
14018.name: Main Street

description: You begin to walk down a huge spiral staircase, and spins and winds
down to complete blackness.  A slight wind howls around you, and the
air gets slightly colder.  Dripping water can be heard all around, and
you begin to wonder how far down this case goes.
14406.name: Spiral Staircase, Down

description: You stand before a huge altar, which is at the easternmost section
of this church.  Beautiful tapestries cover the walls, and a few
stained glass windows allow light in behind the altar.  The music is
fainter here, as you must have walked away from the source.
14233.name: The Altar

description: You have reached the northwest corner of the city.  A large guard
tower sits atop this corner.  You can hear the sounds of the city, and
outside the walls the sounds of wilderness can be heard.
14042.name: Northwest Corner of the Wall

description: This is the office of Kaz, the high pimp of Darrowmere.  There are
expensive paintings all over the walls.  The walls themselves are a
plain institutional white.  There is a large desk in the middle of the
room.  It is covered with financial papers and billing statements.
There is a chair in front of the desk.  It is covered with satin and
looks very comfortable.
14307.name: Head Office in the Whore House

description: You have entered a small bedroom, with a large bed filling up the
center of the room.  There is a torn carpet down under the bed, and a
small chest of drawers is against the wall.  A tall bookcase sits
against the eastern wall.
14336.name: Bedroom in the Residence

description: You walk along the north south eastern wall road.  To the west the
city expands before you, and to the east sounds of the wilderness can
be heard.  The rain continues to fall around you, and this city is in
The rain continues to fall around you, as this city is in a constant
state of storm.
14073.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You have entered a large entrance hall, which leads into a very
large mansion.  This seems extremely huge, but is still nothing
compared to the Imperial Palace to the north.  Lanterns light the
walls, and a beautifully woven rug covers the wooden floor.
14246.name: Entrance to the Mansion

description: You stand on the northernmost road in Darrowmere.  This road
closely parallels the northern wall, which shields the city from the
outside wilderness.  The sound of a fairly close storm can be heard
overhead, as the rain continues to fall around you.
14031.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You walk down a narrow pathway through this valley forest.  Ahead
lies a massive city, and all around you lies a very dense forest.  The
only way to travel here is north-south.
14376.name: Forest Pathway

description: You stand in a large wooden room.  There are animal heads on the
walls, and fancy paintings as well.  There is a beautiful rug on the
floor, and a huge desk facing you.
14346.name: Office in the Casino

description: The alley continues, but appears to curve east to the south.  The
street is lit by a series of lanterns along the nearby buildings.
There is a sign to the north that reads: '{gLights, Lamps, etc.  {x'.
14152.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: You walk down a very well lit alley, with lanterns on the walls of
the nearby buildings.  There are a few doors, but most of them seem
inaccessible.  The rain falls down around you, creating puddles at
your feet.
14194.name: Well Lit Alleyway

description: The staircase drops off for a moment, and you find yourself
standing on a wide stone shelf.  Only darkness hangs below this shelf,
and a lone staircase twirling down into oblivion.
14407.name: A Stone Ledge

description: {8You stand in a large room, with a low ceiling and carpetted floor.
There are windows on the walls, and all have rain pouring down their
outsides.  There is a mellow atmosphere here, and it seems that this
is a place to sit back and relax.  {x
14318.name: {GD{garr{8owme{7r{8e Com{gmon{Gs{x

description: Before you a vast dining hall expands your view.  The walls to this
room seem to reach across the entire city, along with the ceiling.  A
huge wooden table fills the center of the room, along with matching
wooden chairs.  A much larger wooden chair sits at the end of the
table, and some candles burn on the tabletop.  Long drapes cover the
windows, and a beautifully woven rug is strewn over the floor.  The
only apparent exit is back south, where you came from.
14139.name: Grand Dining Hall

description: The hall leads deeper into the Imperial Palace, occasionally taking a
break to branch into smaller hallways and doors.  The woven rug leads the
way down the main hall.
14104.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You continue down a large main in the sewers.  Water drips around
you, as the storm rages on aboveground.  There seems to be no way out
of here.
14390.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: You stand at the base of a very steep mithril ledge.  Water runs
down this ledge, creating a beautiful sight.  The sound of a far away
storm can be heard from above.
14363.name: Bottom of a Steep Ledge

description: You continue to descend to the valley floor.  The floor seems to be
getting much closer to you, but still remains quite overwhelming.
Rain falls around you, causing your path to be a bit more slick.
14370.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: You are walking inside a large underground building, which houses
some sort of packing industry.  There are people walking all around
you, and working on all the various crates.
14165.name: Underground Stockyards

description: The road leads farther west, toward the western wall.  The street is made
of identical cobblestones, each one the same in every way.  Whoever built
these surely had extreme patience and an iron will.  Back east lies the city
center.
14052.name: Western Main Street

description: You have entered a small secret room, right off the laboratory.
There are tables against the wall, and some boiling potions on them.
The only exit is back south to the lab.
14352.name: Secret Room

description: This alleyway stretches westward into darker parts of the city.  It is
much darker here than the main street, and who know what may lurk in that
darkness.  The wind continues to whine through the alley, and rain comes
down around you.
14123.name: Alleyway

description: You walk down a large hallway, which leads to another stairwell.
There is a beautiful rug covering the floor, and expensive paintings
line the walls.  You can hear the storm raging on outside.
14340.name: Hallway

description: You are walking down the side aisle of this massive church.  There
are rows of pews on either side of you, and to the east lies a large
altar.  Stained glass windows line the northern wall, making this
place very beautiful.
14229.name: Inside the Church

description: You stand in a massive room, with a very high ceiling that has
designs and murals on it.  Organ music is heard from all around you,
and there are many pews set in rows here.
14226.name: Inside the Church

description: You walk down a very large sewer below the massive city of
Darrowmere.  Dripping water can be heard all around you, and there is
almost no light here.
14389.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: You stand in a large, dimly lit room.  This room is where extra
equipment, furniture, and pretty much anything is stored in this
palace.  There are piles and stacks of boxes, holding who knows what.
There are no windows in this room, which doesn't help the already dim
atmosphere.
14141.name: Store Room

description: {8You have reached the very end of the basement here, and realize
that you should not have explored this far.  This cavern is extremely
large, and you wonder if you'll be able to get back out, after the
drop to get in here.  Stalagmites cover the cavern, and a cold chill
runs through here.  {x
14300.name: {MCavern of the {RInfernal Genesis{x

description: You are walking down a side aisle of this church.  Organ music can
be heard coming from all around you, and the northern wall is lined
with stained glass windows.  To the east lies the altar of this
church.
14231.name: Inside the Church

description: You are following the western wall road, which closely parallels
the western wall of Darrowmere.  To the south the western gates lie,
and up north farther the northwestern guard tower can be seen.
14046.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You are walking in the mithril caves, which lead deep into the
surface of the planet.  The wind howls through here calmly, and the
faint sound of rain falling can be heard from the other end, wherever
that is.
14357.name: Mithril Caves

description: You have reached the end of this aisle.  The altar is just south
and east of here.  Stained glass windows line the northern wall, and
organ music fills the air around you.
14235.name: Inside the Church

description: You stand in a very small, dark room, with a screen down the middle
of it.  You can hear the faint sound of organ music coming from the
rest of the church.  There is a small bench for kneeling on the floor,
and the only exit is back east.
14338.name: Confession Room

description: Here is the healers sanctuary of the temple.  Many healers come from
across the lands to meet here and spread their methods and remedies.  A
small healing bed is on the floor, and shelves of potions and bottles line
the walls.  Everyone here seems to be at inner peace, as well as peace with
their surroundings.  True serenity lies within this room.
14091.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple, Donation Room{x

description: You stand in a small room, with no windows except the ones facing
directly south.  There is a counter to the north, and on the walls are
bottles and vials, shelved in no particular order.  There are some
items underneath the glass of the counter.
14149.name: Apothecary

description: You are walking down the main hallway of the third floor.  Doors
line the walls, along with lanterns that guide your path.  A
beautifully woven rug covers the floor, and follows the hallway to its
end.
14267.name: Hallway

description: You are following the southern wall road, which travels along the
southernmost section of Darrowmere.  Buildings line the road opposite
of the wall.  The rain still falls around you, and in the distance
thunder can be heard.
14058.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: This road goes north and south, which closely follows the eastern
wall of Darrowmere.  On either end of this road lies a guard tower,
and just north of here lie the eastern gates.  Sounds of the city can
be heard from here, as people bustle about their business.
14072.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You walk along the western wall road, which run north and south.
Noise form the city can be heard, surrounding you and carrying down
the street.  It is contrasted by the noise of wilderness from outside
the western wall.  The rain steadily falls around you.
14068.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You are walking down a very narrow pathway which leads to the
massive city of Darrowmere.  Looking around you, the valley walls
tower up into the sky, and you begin to wonder how you made it down
those walls in the first place.
14378.name: Forest Pathway

description: The Temple opens up wider here, with a vast and very intricate ceiling.
The stone floors contrast the wooden walls.  A warm glow fills the room, as
if some holy presence was near.  There are large stained glass windows
revealing the outside.  Back east lies the main hall of the Temple.
14093.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple{x

description: This platform seems to be able to hold a very large ship, or maybe
a few.  The rain falls down, and drips off the edges of the platform.
Watching this reminds you of just how high you're up.
14405.name: {&Huge Platform Above the Church{x

description: You have entered a fairly large room, with stone walls and a stone
floor.  There are all types of armor on the walls, and even some armor
in the glass case toward the eastern wall.
14174.name: The Armor Shop

description: You stand in a large underground building, much resembling a large
construction yard.  There are stacks of crates everywhere.  Workers
walk around, fiddling with the crates and packing them up.
14164.name: Underground Stockyards

description: You stand at the base of a spiral staircase, which leads straight
up.  A carpet follows the stairs up, and the stairs themselves are
very narrow.  This must lead to different sections of the upper
floors.
14341.name: Spiral Staircase

description: You are walking along the southernmost wall of the guild square.
Fellow adventurers walk around here, practicing their skills and
gaining experience in battle.
14210.name: Southern Wall of Guild Square

description: You have reached the end of this hallway, as it leads to some more
doors.  You wonder what lies beyond those doors, and who may inhibit
them.  Thunder roars from outside, as the storm there rages on.
14258.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: The street reaches east and west, and nears it's end to the eastern side.
The cobblestones beneath your feet are each exact, showing the great
patience of the creator.  The clouds overhead warn of the coming storm, as
it has already begun.  The wind blows through the streets, picking up dust
and rustling hair.
14021.name: Eastern Main Street

description: You have entered the highest point in this church.  The source of
the music is now very apparent: an organ.  This room is practially
filled by the organ, it must the be biggest organ you have ever seen.
A form sits in front of the organ, playing it loudly.
14245.name: The Organ Loft

description: {gYou continue to walk in this dense forest.  There are trees all
around you, and the tops of them allow almost no rain through.
Puddles still cover the forest floor, as water finds its way in, and
there is a damp, musty atmosphere here.  {x
14303.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You have entered a small room, with shelves on the walls and a
large counter to the north.  It is poorly lit in here, and the scent
of incense can be detected.  This appears to be a shop of all types of
magical items from the Orient.
14323.name: Magics of the Orient

description: You walk down a very short hallway.  It leads to yet another spiral
staircase, which leads to the uppermost section of this palace.  Back
west lies the staircase down.
14384.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x

description: You stand in a large entranceway to the {8Shadow Guild{x.  Here is the
centralized headquarters for the largest branch of organized crime in
Darrowmere.  There are voices coming from the north, and the rain
continues to fall to the south.
14175.name: Entranceway

description: You are walking along the easternmost wall in the guild square.
Other adventurers walk around here, practicing their skills and
gaining experience in battle.
14213.name: Eastern Wall of Guild Square

description: You stand in a large room, filled with furniture.  There is a large
window facing south, allowing you to watch the storm outside.  This
must be where guests to the palace stay.
14223.name: Guest Quarters

description: This floor begins the same as the first jade walls and ceiling, with a
slate floor covered by a rug.  This floor houses some guest rooms, for
visitors to the palace.  The massive walls of jade stretch down the hall,
leading to the rest of the center second floor.
14098.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are walking down a narrow hall, which has doors on the western
wall.  This hall is fairly well lit, but there are some shadows
lurking around.  You can hear the faint noise of people talking, and
whips cracking.
14308.name: Inside the Whore house

description: You walk alone a large brick pathway.  The bricks themselves are
extremely large, and made of grey slate.  A thick line of trees is on both
sides of the path.  The path leads toward a massive stone building, with
towers and balconies.  The structure is an impressive architectural piece of
work, obviously built by someone with great power.
14086.name: Brick Pathway

description: The street reaches east and west, with a large gate to the east.  The
stone path follows you wherever you go, always beneath your feet.  Back west
lies the city center.
14020.name: Eastern Main Street

description: You walk along the western wall road, which leads north and south.
To the south a large guard tower can be seen, and also one to the
north.  Just north of here there are also the western gates, leading
out into the wild.
14066.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You have almost reached the massive city of Darrowmere.  You can
detect the soft roar of talk within the city, although it's hard to
pick up with the overhead storm.  As you walk down the center of this
valley, you can't help but feel incredibly insignificant.
14379.name: Forest Pathway

description: You stand in the southeastern tower of Darrowmere.  Here the tower
guards can watch over the entire city, and protect it from danger.
There is no roof above you, so the rain falls all around you as the
storm continues to rage on.
14146.name: SouthEastern Tower

description: You have reached the end of this large residence.  This room is a
formal style, where guests are entertained.  A large door lies to the
west, and back south lies the entrance.  Windows are on the remaining
walls, with rain streaking down them.
14342.name: Large Residence

description: This road goes east and west, which follows the southern wall of
Darrowmere.  The sounds of the city and be heard, along with the
sounds of the wild from beyond the wall.  The city to the north looks
to be ever expanding, as the rain falls down steadily.
14057.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You have reached a very low point in these mithril caves.  The
temperature has gotten considerably hotter here, as you must be
getting closer and closer to the planet's center.  The caves continue
all around you.
14361.name: Mithril Caves

description: You have entered a large dungeon.  There are wooden beds with
chains attached to them everywhere, along with various tools hanging
on the walls.  The room is poorly lit with a few fire lanterns on the
walls.
14314.name: The Dungeon

description: {8You have reached an abrupt end to this basement, which shows
nothing but three stone walls.  It's very cold here, and there is an
eerie presence that makes you feel very uncomfortable.  Just before
you turn back, you notice something different about the floor here.  {x
14299.name: {MEnd of the Basement{x

description: You are walking in the guild square.  Here others like yourself can
battle monsters and gain experience, as well as sharpen their skills.
14218.name: Guild Square

description: Here lie the northern gates, protecting the city from the perils of
the outside, and the outside from the perils of the city.  The wall
road runs east and west here, and the main road leading to the City
Center goes south.
14015.name: Northern Gate

description: You are walking down a narrow pathway that leads to a very large
building.  Windows cover the walls of that building, and the rain
coming down covers those windows entirely.  It is much greener here
than the rest of the slums.
14315.name: Pathway to a Large Building

description: You stand in a large guard tower, which protects the city from the
outside wilderness.  The rain continues to fall from above, creating
many puddles around your feet.  The only exit is back down.
14145.name: NorthEastern Tower

description: You are walking along the second floor of this church.  It is
considerably smaller than the bottom floor, as it reaches toward a
point at the top.  You can hear the sounds of the storm outside.
14239.name: Second Floor of the Church

description: This road goes east and west, which parallels the northern wall of
Darrowmere.  To the south a large building towers over the rest of the
city, and it looks to be very important.  The sound of rain falling,
along with an occasional thunder strike can be heard.
14033.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You have climbed yet another staircase, which has brought you to
the third floor of this church.  The walls are lined with stained
glass windows, and the sound of organ music grows even louder.
14240.name: Third Floor of the Church

description: You have reached the end of this hallway, and there is yet another
door to the west.  People can be heard talking in these rooms,
although you can still hear the rain falling outside.
14309.name: Inside the Whore house

description: You stand on the east-west northern wall road of Darrowmere.
Puddles surround your feet, as the rain continues to fall all around
you.  The sound of the wilderness can be heard to the north, and the
sound of bustling trade to the south.
14034.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You have entered a large jail cell, which must be the main one of
this building.  There are a few metal cots on the walls, and a sink
and toilet.  There is a small barred window facing east, revealing a
damp, yet beautiful garden.
14275.name: Cell

description: You are walking down a large hallway, which leads south to the main
hallway, and north to some large room.  The lights here reflect off
the jade walls, creating a beautiful look.
14137.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x

description: The sewers consist of a massive network of underground pipes.
There seems to be no way out of here, except death.
14391.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: You have reached the end of this large hallway.  A spiral staircase
leads upward, and back west lies the rest of this floor.
14382.name: {GJ{gade Hallwa{Gy{x

description: You are walking along the east west southern wall road.  To the
north the city looms over you, and to the south lies the deep forest.
Puddles of rain sit at your feet, and seem to splash up toward you as
the rain falls.
14056.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: The alley comes to a sudden end here, and stops before a few large
buildings.  The intricate green stone walls of these buildings are almost
hypnotizing as you stand in awe before them.  There's something about the
way the rain hits this type of stone that's different...
14127.name: Alleyway

description: This road follows the eastern wall very closely.  To the west the
city seems to be ever expanding before you, as if it were constantly
growing.  The rain still falls around you, soaking your clothes and
creating puddles at your feet.
14028.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You have reached the fourth floor of this church, which seems to be
the highest.  The organ music is very loud here, and the source of it
must be near.  The sounds of the outside storm also grow very loud, as
you get higher above the ground.
14243.name: Fourth Floor of the Church

description: You have entered a large, well-lit room filled with dice tables.
Most people here are crowded around the center table though, as that
is where all the action is going on.  You seem compelled to go over
and spend something.
14349.name: Dice Tables

description: You stand in a large room, with a wooden counter to the north.
There are meats behind the counter and underneath it, and a large
freezer door is to the north, behind the counter.  The floor is
slightly wet near the door, as some rain falls in after you open it.
14305.name: Butcher

description: You stand in a large room filled with equipment and crates.  The
wall of this structure is to your east, and back west lies the rest of
the stockyards.  The sound of machinery can be heard off in the
distance.
14167.name: Underground Stockyards

description: You have reached the bottom of this very tall staircase.  The room
you stand in is very dark, and musty.  To the east lies the basement
of this mansion, and all the horrors it contains.
14292.name: Base of the Spiral Staircase

description: You continue to delve deeper into these mithril caves.  There are
sounds of unknown things all around you, and the faint sound of
dripping water can be heard.  The caves seem to reach deeper at this
section.
14360.name: Mithril Caves

description: You have reached the end of the fourth floor of this church.  The
music is even louder now, and seems to be coming from directly above.
There is a spiral staircase leading up to what must be the very top of
this church.
14244.name: Fourth Floor of the Church

description: You are walking along the north south road that follows the western
wall of Darrowmere.  Just north of here lies the northwestern guard
tower, and south lies the western gates.  The rain is still falling
softly from the sky.
14043.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  It comes to
an abrupt end here, and you're faced with three walls before you.  You
can hear the sounds of the raging storm coming from outside of this
mansion.
14251.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: The stairwell leads to the fourth floor of the palace, not quite reaching
the top.  The stairs are made of a fine slate, which shows the builder's
taste in good material.  A solid stone banister goes up the stairs ahead of
you.
14105.name: Stairwell

description: You stand in a large room, with dark green carpeting.  There are
lights all over, and combined with all the machines and noise it is a
maelstorm of confusion.  People walk around, having a wonderful time.
14344.name: The Imperial Casino

description: You walk in a very large casino, housed completely in the third
floor of the palace.  There are slot machines against the walls, and
betting tables in the center of the room.
14348.name: Imperial Casino

description: This road follows the western wall, and there are two guard towers
at either end.  Sounds from the city can be heard, and looking to the
east, the city seems to be constantly expanding before you.
14065.name: Along the Western Wall

description: The alley forks here, and divides into three paths.  All three seem to
lead to dense parts of the city, as you are very near to the center area.
The nearest main road appears to be far to the west.
14126.name: Alleyway

description: You have entered a large residence, that sits below the rest of the
city.  Buildings on all sides tower over this, and the rain from above
patterns on the roof.  Back south lies the exit.
14092.name: Large Residence

description: You stand in a huge room, filled with gambling machines and dice
tables.  People walk around here, drinking heavily and spending their
money.
14347.name: Imperial Casino

description: You walk along the eastern wall road, which parallels the road
perfectly.  To the north and south ends of this road lie guard towers,
and to the east lies the rest of the city.  A very tall building lies
to your direct west, with a beautiful garden surrounding it.
14025.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You stand in a well-lit room, with windows facing the alley.  Music
plays loudly, and some people dance in the center of the room.  The
predominant colors of this room and red, white, and green.  There is a
large counter to the east, and a small kitchen behind it.
14333.name: The Hoagie Emporium

description: You round the corner of the balcony, which winds around the upper
tower of this church.  It's raining pretty hard, and the wind is
blowing softly.  You notice a looming building to the northeast.
14403.name: On the Balcony

description: {8You stand in a damp, dark room, which lies below the mansion.
Dripping water and howls around you make this a very eerie place to
be.  You can head steps around you, and wonder what evils could be
lurking here.  {x
14293.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: You are walking along the third floor of this huge church.  The
music grows around you, as well as the sound of the outside storm.
There is a small spiral staircase leading up, probably to the highest
floor of this church.
14242.name: Third Floor of the Church

description: The stairwell reaches up to the fifth floor.  This palace is literally
gigantic.  The grey slate stairs climb their way to the next floor, and the
banister following all the way.
14109.name: Stairwell

description: The alley reaches deeper into the city, leading towards more buildings
and such.  The rain continues to fall around you, with a slight rumble of
thunder off in the distance.  The shadows grow deep in this area, along with
the puddles as well.
14125.name: Alleyway

description: {gYou are walking along the dense forests that lie within this city.
Rain barely makes it through the tree cover, and still reaches you.
You can hear sounds of wildlife all around you.  {x
14277.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You stand in a dimly lit nightclub, with dancers and customers all
over.  There is a large bar in the center of the room, and a stage to
the north.  You wonder how this place has remained out of the public
eye.  There is a general feeling of excitement in the air here.
14399.name: The Darrowmere Players' Club

description: You stand in a dark entranceway, which leads to who knows what.
Music and voices can be heard nearby, and you wonder what is going on.
There certainly weren't any signs telling you about this place.
14398.name: Entranceway

description: You have entered a small room which seems to surround you with
glowing light.  All around you, on the walls, from the ceiling, hang
different lamps to guide you through your journeys.  A counter is
against the eastern wall, and a shopkeeper seems eager to assist you.
14153.name: Lights, Lamps, Etc.

description: You have entered the famous Greenstone Inn through a doorway from
the Temple.  Here weary travellers can stay and rest, or just hang
around and chat together.  There is a peaceful atmosphere here, and
the air is calm and dry, as opposed to the outside.  A healing pool
sits in the center of the room, and an old healer wanders around.
14191.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Inn{x

description: You are walking down the side aisle of this large church.  Rows of
pews line this aisle, and to the east lies a huge altar.  Stained
glass windows line the southern wall, making this place very
beautiful.
14230.name: Inside the Church

description: The southeast common square lies here, with it's compliments of shops and
buildings.  The stone path leads around the square, bringing everyone to
shop after shop.  The wind picks up a bit of dirt around your feet.
14084.name: Common Square

description: The hallway reaches into the fifth floor of the palace.  This place is
remarkably huge.  The walls and ceiling made entirely of jade, and the slate
floors covered by a beautiful rug.  Doors and smaller hallways reach off
from the main hall.
14110.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: This road follows the northern wall, which extends high above your
head.  Noise can be head from the south side, which contains the
poorer section of the city.  The rain still continues to fall here,
softly.
14038.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You stand in the master bedroom of this mansion.  A woven rug
covers the floor, and on top of it lies a bed and a chest of drawers.
A huge fireplace is set in the southern wall, and a large window faces
to the north.  It's warm in here, as compared to the rest of this
mansion.
14270.name: Master Bedroom in the Mansion

description: You are standing in a large hallway which covers the top floor of
the guild.  Many members of this guild walk around here, conversing
together and planning their next jobs.  The exit is back west.
14184.name: Hallway

description: You walk down a narrow pathway, which leads deep into the heart of
this valley.  Ahead the massive city of Darrowmere looms over you.
The forest around you is very grown up, and must have been here for a
very long time.
14375.name: Forest Pathway

description: You have entered a small room, with glass cases all around the
room.  There is a counter to the northern side, but all the other
walls have glass cases on them.  As you walk in, light gleams off
every gem in the room, creating a beautiful display of light for you.
14173.name: Jewelry Shop

description: You stand on a large stairwell, leading up to the next level of the
Imperial Palace.  The stairs are made of grey slate, each one intricately
carved to show the great patience of the builder.  A large stone banister
accompanies the stairs to their destination the second floor of the palace.
14097.name: Stairwell

description: You are walking in the guild square, which is below the rest of the
city of Darrowmere.  This is a place where low level adventurers can
come and sharpen their skills, as well as gain some experience.
14219.name: Guild Square

description: You are walking down a fairly wide section of the church, although
it is not as wide as the bottom floor.  You can hear the rain pouring
down outside, and an occasional boom of thunder.  This floor goes east
and west only.
14238.name: Second Floor of the Church

description: You stand in a medium sized room, with a bed and a chest of
drawers.  There is a large window facing outside, although hard to see
through due to the rain flowing down it.  This appears to be where
guests to the palace stay.
14221.name: Guest Quarters

description: You have entered a large laboratory, with vials and beakers full of
unknown chemicals.  There is a large bookshelf against the northern
wall, and the only apparent exit is to the west.
14351.name: Laboratory

description: Before you spans more of the jade hallway, leading up to yet another
stairwell.  The woven rug is utterly beautiful, telling the story of the
long wait for this palace.  The architect of this building must have had
infinite patience to withstand the creation of the palace.
14108.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are walking down a side aisle of this massive church.  Music is
heard from all around you, and you can't seem to locate its source.
The altar of this church lies to the east.
14232.name: Inside the Church

description: You stand in a small bedroom, with only a bed and chest of drawers.
There is a large woven rug covering the floor, and a window to the
west shows the storm outside.
14265.name: Bedroom

description: You are walking along the north south section of the main street.
Just south of here lie the southern gates.  Farther up north lies the
city center, and the city itself expands before you on both sides of
this road.  The rain continues to fall down around you.
14002.name: Southern Main Street

description: You have reached the northernmost section of guild square.  There
are small buildings along this edge, and back south lies the rest of
the square.  You can hear the faint patter of rain from the
aboveground storm.
14202.name: Northern Wall of Guild Square

description: You are standing in the northwestern tower of Darrowmere.  Here the
tower guards protect the city from any danger that may come from the
outside.  The rain falls from overhead, as there is no roof above you.
Puddles form around your feet.
14144.name: NorthWestern Tower

description: The hallway continues, reaching down the center of the second floor.
This building is by far one of the most large in the realms.  It's perfect
architecture and sheer beauty make it truly wonderful.  The woven rug leads
the way into more of the hallway.
14099.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You stand in a large bedroom.  There are shelves on the walls, and
a large bed in the middle of the room.  Some paintings are on the
walls, and a window faces north, exposing a dark alley.
14343.name: Bedroom

description: You stand in a room that is directly below the warehouse.  All
around you lie crates and boxes, containing who knows what.  There are
voices to the south, and the sound of running machinery.
14159.name: Beneath the Warehouse

description: You are walking along the eastern wall road.  Here the wall looks
to be towering above you.  The city expands before you to the east,
and to the direct east a large building looms overhead.  You are
walking along the eastern wall road.  Here the wall looks to be
towering above you.  The city expands before you to the west, and to
the direct west a large building looms overhead.  To the direct west a
lovely garden surrounds the tall structure, contrasting its foreboding
look.  The rain continues to fall down around you.
14024.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You stand in a large hall, with more rooms branching off from it.  Guards
walk to and fro, checking in with others and then leaving out to the
streets.  The walls are made of a solid wood, and the floor of pure stone.
It is warm here, in contrast to the slightly colder air of the streets.
14114.name: Cityguard Headquarters

description: You are walking down the main hallway in the second floor of this
mansion.  You can hear the roar of the rain from outside, as the storm
rages on.
14253.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: {8You are walking in the basement below the large mansion.  Footsteps
can be heard around you, showing that you are not alone here.  You
wonder what evils could be lurking in the shadows here, and also what
they want.  {x
14297.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: You have entered a large room, filled to the ceiling with items to
be sold.  A large counter faces to the north, and even more items lie
behind it.  You can hear rain falling outside, as the storm continues
to rage on.
14334.name: Darrowmere Pawn Shop

description: You stand in a large room in this house.  A small shaded window
faces to the west, and a large four-post bed fills the room.  The bed
is neatly made, although it looks like it has gotten a lot of use.
14311.name: Room in the Whore House

description: This hallway is rather short, leading to a couple rooms.  The walls and
floor are both a greenish stone, more specifically jade.  A faint sound of
music can be heard from the east.
14121.name: Hallway

description: You walk down a fairly narrow hallway, which reaches into the
center of the {8Shadow Guild{x.  The sound of voices can be heard, along
with the clatter of footsteps.  Back west lies the exit out of here.
14179.name: Hallway in the {8Shadow Guild{x

description: You stand in the southwestern corner of the guild square.  Here you
and for fellow travellers can hone your skills and gain experience.
The sounds of fighting can be heard from the rest of the square.
14208.name: Southwest Corner of Guild Square

description: The street reaches east and west, leading to more of this large city.  A
rather large building can be seen to the north, and an ever bigger one north
of that.  The cobblestone street looks absolutely perfect; each stone
disturbingly exact.
14017.name: Main Street

description: You stand in a large guard tower, which watches and protects the
city from the southwest.  There is a stone railing around this tower,
with an open roof.  The rain pours down around you, creating a few
puddles around your feet.
14143.name: SouthWestern Guard Tower

description: You are walking along the western wall of the guild square.  Fellow
travellers walk around, fighting monsters and honing their skills.
14206.name: Western Wall of Guild Square

description: You have reached the southeastern corner of the guild square.  Here
other travellers battle monsters and practice their skills.  The floor
here is splattered with a bit of blood.
14212.name: Southeast Corner of Guild Square

description: {8You continue to walk in this basement, stumbling around in the
blackness.  There are no lights on the walls, so only the light you
carry with you is guiding your path.  Sounds in this basement suggest
that you're not the only one down here.  {x
14298.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: The street leads north and south, and the city center is visible to the
south.  A large building lies to the northeast, and seems to be the largest
building in the city.  Rain falls around you, and coats the stone walls of
the city's buildings.  Puddles form at your feet.
14012.name: Northern Main Street

description: Here lies the main hall of the headquarters.  Masses of guards stand
around, talking about assignments and trouble on the streets.  A large desk
lies against the southern wall, and an important looking guard sits at it.
Lamps on the walls give light off in the room, creating a few shadows in the
corners.
14115.name: Cityguard Headquarters

description: You are walking down a narrow hallway with cell doors on either
side.  This is apparently where prisoners of this city are taken and
held, until their sentence is up.
14272.name: Hallway

description: You stand in a small bedroom, with very little furniture.  There is
a beautifully woven rug on the floor, and a window to the west.  You
can hear the storm carry on outside this mansion.
14264.name: Bedroom

description: You stand in a fairly large room, that is not very well lit.  There
are a few lanterns, which provide just enough light to see around the
room.  There are weapons hanging on the walls, and a large counter to
the west.
14328.name: The Daemon's Claw

description: You walk down the western wall of guild square.  Here others fight
monsters, and grow stronger with their skills.  You can hear sounds of
the storm coming from above ground.
14207.name: Western Wall of Guild Square

description: The hallway begins as all the others do.  The jade walls accompany the
ceiling, over the run-covered floor.  There are doors and hallways branching
off this hall, leading to other rooms in the palace.  The light reflects off
the walls, creating a wonderful display of light before you.
14102.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You walk inside the city morgue.  The walls and floor are made of a
fine white tile, and seem to be very sterile.  This building is where
the city's dead can be prepared for the eternal rest.
14287.name: City Morgue

description: This is a moderately large room, almost circular in shape.  There are
benches against the walls, and chairs in front of them.  The walls and floor
are made of a hard wood, probably oak.  There are all types of inventions,
weapons, armor, everything you can imagine on the walls and benches.  A
small furnace is in the middle of the room, providing heat for it.  The door
back north leads to the hallway.
14113.name: {8Teron's {!W{1orksho{!p{x

description: You stand in a dark office, with weapons and armor all over the
walls.  There are some modest office furnishings, and some murals
painted on the walls.
14401.name: Dark Office

description: The street reaches east and west, with the city center and common square
to the west.  A massive building can be seen to the north, stretching far
into the sky.  The gathering storm overheard lets itself known with a rumble
of thunder.
14019.name: Eastern Main Street

description: The wall road continues east and west, and it appears that you are
nearing the northwest corner to the west.  The sounds of the city fill
the air, as the dense part of the city is directly to your south.
14041.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You are walking down a large hallway in the guild.  Many members of
the guild watch you as you intrude on their territory.  The sound of
the rain falling outside can be heard faintly.
14186.name: Hallway

description: You stand in a very dark passageway, which leads east to an unknown
room.  You get a deep feeling of dread as you get closer.
14400.name: Dimly Lit Passageway

description: You walk along the westernmost side of the guild square.  This
entire square looks like a good place to fight, practice your skills,
and gain some experience.  Buildings line all sides of this square.
14205.name: Western Wall of Guild Square

description: You have entered a large Morgue for the city of Darrowmere.  Here
the city's dead are stored, examined, and prepared for the eternal
rest.  The walls are white tiled, and look very sterile.
14286.name: City Morgue

description: You are walking along the north south eastern wall road.  To the
west lies the vast city, which seems to be ever expanding before you.
To the east lies the great wilderness, which is shielded from the city
by this very wall.  The rain continues to fall around you constantly,
as the storm covers the city.
14071.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You stand in a large room, filled with produce an other various
groceries.  There is a cooler atmosphere here, as compared with the
outside temperature.  There is a large counter towards the northern
wall, with a grocer behind it.
14172.name: Grocer

description: You stand in a large square, much resebling any ordinary market
square.  The ceiling is very high, and there are no apparent walls.
Small buildings line the sides, and the square continues around you.
14200.name: Center of Guild Square

description: {gThe forest continues, leading to deeper and darker parts of itself.
The ground in covered with a fine layer of wood chips, soaked with
rain and beginning to rot.  The forest expands before you to the
north.  {x
14278.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You are on the uppermost section of the staircase, which has led to
the upper floor of this guild.  Members of this guild walk around, and
seem to not like your presence.  Back down lies the exit to this
guild.
14181.name: Spiral Staircase

description: You have entered a large room where the Psionics train their
spells.  There are targets for spells on the walls, and the strong
