sense of magic is felt here.  The only exits are north and east.
14354.name: Training Rooms

description: You walk along the eastern wall road.  Buildings line the road
opposite of the wall, and farther west lies the rest of the city.
Noises of the city can be heard very easily from here, along with
noises from the wilderness.  The storm continues overhead, and does
not show any signs of stopping.
14070.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You have entered a large building, where the social activity of
these slums takes place.  The room is fairly neat, with panelled walls
and a tiled floor.  A large staircase leads up to the rest of the
commons.
14317.name: Darrowmere Commons

description: You have reached a small room that contains only a spiral
staircase.  The staircase twists up to the next floor of this
building, which houses the {8Shadow Guild{x.  Back far to the west lies
the exit of this guild.
14180.name: Spiral Staircase

description: You continue to walk down this very long and narrow pathway.  This
path seems to have been out of use for some time.  The city of
Darrowmere looms over you to the north.
14377.name: Forest Pathway

description: You stand in a very small jail cell, which serves as a place to
hold prisoners of this city.  It has a metal bed hanging from the
wall, and a sink and toilet.  A small window of bars is on the western
wall.
14273.name: Cell

description: You stand in a medium sized room, with furniture suitable for
living.  The air is slightly warmer here than the hallway outside.  A
window to the south shows the rain pouring down outside.
14261.name: Bedroom

description: You walk down a large pipeline, which leads deeper and deeper into
the complex sewer system below Darrowmere.  You hear footsteps around
you and wonder what could be making them.
14394.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: You are walking down a very narrow alley, which tears into the
dense city of Darrowmere.  The sound of trade can be heard, as the
cityfolk bustle about their business.  The sound of the overhead storm
can also be heard, as a soft crash of thunder reminds you of it.  A
sign points to the north that reads '{gArmory{x'.
14158.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: You are walking down the main hallway of the second floor in the
mansion.  A beautifully woven rug runs down the middle of the hall,
and lanterns on the walls light your way.
14256.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You stand at a junction of the western wall road and an alleyway
that leads deep into the city's underbelly.  South from here goes
toward the western gates, and to the north lies the northwestern
corner and tower.
14045.name: Along the Western Wall

description: This road follows the western wall, which runs just north and
south.  South of here the western gates can be seen, and north the
northwestern guard tower can barely be made out.  The rain is still
falling around you, crashing softly to the ground.
14047.name: Along the Western Wall

description: The square gets slightly smaller here.  Buildings and shops line the
edges of the square, and people bustle in and out of them.  To the south and
north lies more of the common square.  East lies eastern Darrowmere, and
west lies the famous City Center.
14016.name: Common Square

description: You stand in the center of a large circular arena.  There are heavy
steel doors around the entire sand covered floor.  The arena in
completely enclosed, with huge lanterns high up on the walls.  A cold
wind blows from an unseen source.  You're not entirely sure what comes
next, but chances are it isn't going to be very pleasant.
14410.name: {BL{bord{R T{reron's {8Battle Arena{x

description: This road runs east and west, following the fairly straight wall
that shields the northern section of the city.  The wall itself is
made of fine brick, carefully mortared together.  This city must have
taken immense time to contruct, and consumed vast ammounts of
patience.
14036.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You are inside a large stone warehouse.  There are numerous crates
and boxed stacked up around this place, containing who knows what.
There are few windows in this room, allowing very little light in.
Some lanterns on the walls help guide your path.
14329.name: Stone-Walled Warehouse

description: You stand at the top of a very steep and high staircase.  This is
how the servants get to this level from the base floor.  The stairs
lack carpeting and are made of a plain slate.
14392.name: Top of the Servant's Stairwell

description: {6You stand before a gigantic valley that spans your entire field of
view.  A slight mountain rim surrounds this valley, but you can just
barely make it out.  The entire valley floor is covered with forest,
and in the center a massive {^city{6 seems to grow out of it.  Stormclouds
loom overhead, releasing rain constantly over this valley.  Sounds of
wildlife can be heard from far below, as the valley teems with life.  {x
14367.name: {GB{gef{7ore a {&Lus{7h Val{gle{Gy{x

description: The hall continues, leading to the rest of the palace.  The great walls
depict the great worksmanship of the builder through their intricate design.
Some side hallways and doors lead into other parts of the building.
14103.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are almost near the end of these mithril caves.  Very faint
light can be seen streaming down, and the sound of rain can be heard
very strongly.
14362.name: Nearing the End of the Caves

description: You stand before the massive gates which lead into Darrowmere.
Rain falls down all around you, and looking farther away the valley
walls tower above you.  The city spans all your view to the north, and
back south lies the forest path.
14000.name: Before the Gates of Darrowmere

description: You stand in a large room, with pictures on the walls of various
animals.  There is a large counter to the north, which stands before a
closed door.  You can hear the rain falling outside, along with an
occasional thunder strike.
14331.name: Darrowmere Pet Shop

description: You have almost reached the bottom of this massive valley.  Rain
falls around you, and a few strikes of lightning cause you to jump.
The city ahead seems almost to big to be real, as you get very
overwhelmed.
14372.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: You have reached the top of a lush shelf in this valley.  A long
drop down would most likely put you in the base of the valley.  The
city to the north is absolutely huge.
14373.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: You walk along a very narrow alleyway, which at the moment reaches
east and west.  To the east a bend in the alley can be seen, and
farther west lies the main road.  Rain falls all around you, creating
many puddles at your feet.
14154.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: You are walking along the easternmost wall of the guild square.
Here other travellers fight monsters and gain experience.  You think
you can hear the faint sound of pattering rain from aboveground.
14214.name: Eastern Wall of Guild Square

description: You stand in a large room, which serves as quarters for the guards
of this mansion.  A large bed fills the room, along with a dresser for
holding clothing.  Lanterns are set in the walls, providing enough
light to see in here.
14271.name: Guard Quarters

description: This hallway leads through the heart of the first level of the palace.
It's fine jade walls and ceiling make it the most beautiful structure in the
realms.  The floor is covered in a wonderfully designed rug, woven from none
other than the finest silks and linens around.  The hall continues eastward,
leading deeper into this remarkable palace.
14088.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You stand at a large bar in the Imperial Casino.  Glasses hang on
the walls, and the western wall is covered with a line of tall
bottles.  There are polished wooden bar stools right next to the bar.
14381.name: Casino Bar

description: Many buildings line this road, with people walking in and out of
them.  The residents of this city seem to be completely unaffected by
the state of the weather, and go about their business as if there were
no storm.  The wind picks up slightly, and blows the rain around.
14003.name: Southern Main Street

description: You have entered a large room, with a high ceiling and very wide
walls.  Before you, a huge pile of wealth lies on the floor,
containing various riches and treasures.  There is so much value here,
you don't know what to take first.  In the corner a huge guard stands,
protecting the wealth.
14396.name: Treasure Room

description: You stand in a large room that is poorly lit.  The ceiling is very low
here.  The air is thin, combined with tobacco smoke and the scent of cheap
liquor.  A few pool tables are set into the floor, and some normal tables
with chairs sit along the walls.  Various signs clutter the walls, and a few
dartboards.  A couple stained glass windows are about the room, letting in
very little light.
14134.name: Pool Hall

description: You stand on a large platform overlooking the majority of Darrowmere.
The rain comes down all around you, soaking your clothes.  This platform
looks as if it could hold a few good-sized airships.  There are lights all
around the edges of the platform, helping the visibility in the dark
atmosphere.
14120.name: {&Platform High Above the City{x

description: You have reached the end of this alleyway.  There is a small door
to the west, leading to a small building.  The rest of the city towers
over you, and makes this structure seem very small.
14322.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: You are walking along the easternmost wall of the guild square.
Some monsters roam about here, beckoning you to fight them.  This
looks like a good place to gain experience in battle, along with
sharpening your skills.
14215.name: Eastern Wall of Guild Square

description: You are walking down a fairly wide section of the church, although
it is not as wide as the bottom floor.  The music grows around you,
and seems to be getting louder and louder.  You can also hear the rain
pattering down on the roof of this church.
14237.name: Second Floor of the Church

description: You stand in a large room, with a low ceiling.  The walls are made of
some kind of dark wood, and the floor is carpeted.  A small bar lies in the
corner, and some couches are pushed up against the walls.  A soft hint of
jazz music radiates from somewhere within the room, creating a soft
atmosphere.  Rows of glasses hang above the bar, and some stools sit around
it.  This looks like a place where you can kick back and rest.
14122.name: {2The {@Burn{2t {@Engli{2sh {@Muf{2fin{x

description: You are walking along a narrow alley, which leads east and west
right now.  The street is lit by a few lanterns, which are hung from
the walls of the nearby buildings.  There are signs to the north and
south, but cannot be made out.  They are very faded, and the rain
hinders your vision.
14150.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: You have reached the eastern wall of this massive underground
building.  There are crates everywhere, along with workers.  The sound
of machinery can be heard from all around, but cannot be seen.
14166.name: Underground Stockyards

description: {8You are walking in the basement below the large mansion in
Darrowmere.  You can hear dripping water, along with the sounds of
someone else walking around here.  You wonder what it could be, which
makes this place very eerie.  {x
14295.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: You stand in a small jail cell.  There is a metal cot hanging from
the western wall, and a sink and toilet cover the rest of the room.  A
small window of bars faces to the north.
14274.name: Cell

description: This road is the southernmost road in Darrowmere.  It follows the
southern wall, which shields the city from the outside wild.  To the
north the city looms over your head, and seems to be ever expanding as
you watch it.
14077.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You stand at the top of a very tall spiral staircase.  The stairs
are made of granite, and they have a metal railing following them
down.  As far as you can see down from here, it's dark, and very cold.
14291.name: Top of a Spiral Staircase

description: {R***{rBeware!{R***{x
Most adventurers who journey down from this point do not make it out alive!  Heed this warning, and turn back before it is too late!
You are travelling in a narrow tunnel, which reaches downward into
You are travelling in a narrow tunnel, which reaches downward into the
Sewers of Darrowmere.  It is dimly lit here, and the only two exits
are up and down.  {2There are some scribblings on the wall here{x.
14135.name: Narrow Tunnel

description: You walk inside a massive underground structure, which contains
hundreds of crates.  There are people walking around and going about
their business.  The screeching noise of metal against metal can be
heard some distance from here.
14162.name: Underground Stockyards

description: The street reaches it's end here, and begins to stretch north and south.
The gate is composed of two massive wooden and iron doors, most likely very
heavy.  To the north a massive building can be seen...  It must be one of
some importance.
14022.name: Eastern Gate

description: You have turned a corner in this hallway, to find yet more hallway.
There is a door to the south, which leads to some unknown room.  There
are voices coming from the east and south.
14187.name: Hallway

description: You are nearing the altar of this massive church.  Whoever build
this structure must have had immense time in which to contruct it.
The sound of organ music is heard all around you, almost drowning out
the pattern of the rain outside.
14228.name: Inside the Church

description: The northwest common square lies here, with it's compliments of shops and
buildings.  Beneath your feet is the cobblestone of the square; each stone
disturbingly exact, each one set perfectly in place.  The Creator of this
city took every precaution to make it perfect.  Maybe someday you'll be able
to meet him...
14082.name: Common Square

description: You are walking in the guild square, where adventures like yourself
can gain experience in battle and sharpen their skills.  You can
almost hear the roar of rain aboveground.
14220.name: Guild Square

description: You are walking along the eastern wall road, which runs north and
south.  This is the easternmost place in Darrowmere, and the outside
wilderness lies just beyond this wall.  The rain falls steadily around
you, with no signs of stopping.
14026.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: The hallway leads to more of the fourth floor.  Along with it follows the
beautiful jade walls and ceiling, and also the woven rug-covered floor.  The
light in the room bounces from wall to wall, making it astoundingly
beautiful.
14107.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are walking down the main hallway in this mansion.  Paintings
cover the walls, along with tapestries and lanterns.  Some huge lights
also hang from the ceiling, making this hallway very well lit.
14249.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: This road follows the western wall of Darrowmere.  To the north
lies the northwestern corner, and south more lies the western gates.
To the east you can see the vast city, expanding across your entire
view.
14044.name: Along the Western Wall

description: You have entered a large storeroom in this guild.  Here some
members of the guild stand around, and retrieve things from boxes and
crates.  The only exit is back south.
14183.name: Store Room

description: You are walking along the northernmost road in Darrowmere.  The
northern wall is right along this road, and is at least three feet
thick.  The sounds of trade can be heard from the rest of the city,
and the sound of a growing storm can be heard directly above you.
14030.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: The street continues, leading further away from the city center.
Eastward lies a large palace.  The bustling city traffic can be heard all
around you, leading off in all directions.
14011.name: Main Street

description: The alleyway continues, leading deeper into the depths of the city's
underbelly.  The rain pelts down on the street in certain areas, and several
puddles have formed around you.  Buildings cover both sides of the alley,
and their dark green stone walls tower over you.
14124.name: Alleyway

description: {gYou are walking in the forest that lies within the city.
Vegetation has consumed most of the city at this point, as only
crumbled buildings lies here.  Trees have grown up right through most
of them, leaving only signs of a once prosperous neighborhood.  {x
14284.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You stand in a large room, with paintings on the walls.  There is a
leather couch against one of the walls.  This seems to be the place
where the Psionics hang out and relax.
14353.name: Psionicists' Lounge

description: You stand in a large room, where the Psionics train their spells
and skills.  There are multiple targets on the walls, and some various
wands and scrolls aside them.  The only exit is back south.
14355.name: Training Rooms

description: You have reached a sharp bend in this hallway, where it turns to
the east.  The rug also turns to the east, and follows the hall.
Lanterns line the walls, providing adequate light here for you to see.
14268.name: Bend in the Hallway

description: The hallway leads to a dead end, with jail doors on the walls.  The walls
and floor are made of solid stone.  It is slightly cooler in here than in
the main hall, but it's bearable.  Back south lies the main headquarters.
14116.name: Hallway

description: You stand in a large room, with stone walls and a stone floor.
There are lamps on the walls, and a large lamp hanging from the
ceiling.  Tapestries hang from the walls, and there is a large counter
sitting before the western wall.  A large safe door can be seen behind
the counter.
14198.name: Bank of Darrowmere

description: You have entered a large, well lit room.  There are tables and a
large bar here, along with many tired travellers who need a break.
Music plays softly in the background over the roar of the rain
outside.
14192.name: {GG{greenston{Ge {8Inn, Tavern{x

description: You have entered a medium sized room, with a bed and chest of
drawers in it.  A large window faces to the south, with rain pouring
down the outside of it.  This must be where guests to the palace stay.
14222.name: Guest Quarters

description: The Temple continues here, with pillars on either side.  The temple seems
to start to open up, as if leading into a larger area.  The soft chant of
healers and trickle of water fills the air.  Back south lies the entrance to
the temple, and north lies the altar.
14090.name: {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Temple{x

description: {gYou walk along the dense forests of Darrowmere, where the city is
almost overtaken by vegetation.  It's no wonder the forest has begun
to consume the city, with all the rain here it must be very fertile.  {x
14279.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You are following the road that goes east and west, which follows
the towering northern city wall.  You can barely see the tops of the
massive trees that populate the northern forest over the wall.
Looking south there is the dense part of the city, which consists of
the slums and tenements.
14037.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You have reached the end of this aisle.  The altar is just north
and east of here.  Stained glass windows line the southern wall, and
organ music fills the air around you.
14234.name: Inside the Church

description: You are walking along the southern wall road of Darrowmere.  The
sounds of the city can be heard from all around you, which contrast
the sounds of the wild from the south.  The rain continues to fall
steadily, and the rumble of thunder sounds in the distance.
14076.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: {gYou stand in a very open area of the forest, although the treetops
still shield you from the rain.  There is a large fountain here, and
it appears that this was a beautiful park square, before the forest
began to overtake the city.  {x
14304.name: {GClearing in the Forest{x

description: You walk down a wide hallway, which leads to a few doors.  Members
of this guild walk around here, and seem to dislike your being here.
Voices can be heard from nearby rooms.
14182.name: Hallway

description: You stand in a small bedroom, with modest furniture suitable for
living.  There is a window to the north, showing the storm outside.
This room is well lit by a lantern hanging from the ceiling.  The only
exit is back south.
14262.name: Bedroom

description: The hallway leads southeast.  A faint light can be seen down at the end,
like it opens up toward it's close.  The blowing of wind can be heard, along
with the sound of raindrops.  The walls here and solid oak, and obviously
quite expensive, as is the rest of this palace.
14117.name: Hallway

description: You are walking down a large hallway in the {8Shadow Guild{x.  Voices
can be heard in nearby rooms in this guild, and the sound of the rain
falling outside can be heard.  Members of this guild walk about, and
look disturbed at your being here.
14189.name: Hallway

description: You stand in a very small room, which is somehow very well hidden
from sight on the wall.  It is poorly lit in here, and there are very
modest furnishings.
14393.name: Small Room Atop the Wall

description: You stand in a large room in this house.  There is a four-post bed
in the center of the room, and a large chest of drawers against the
wall.  A large rug covers the floor, and there is a shaded window
facing to the west.
14310.name: Room in the Whore House

description: You are walking along the northernmost section of this square.
Buildings line the sides of this square, and the sound of battles is
heard from the rest of the square.  Lanterns light your path around
this area.
14203.name: Northern Wall of Guild Square

description: Here the alleyway widens a bit, but not for very long.  It seems as
if this is a popular area in this section of the city, as the alley
widens and the road seems a bit more travelled.  The rain patters
around your feet, and many puddles have formed on the ground.
14151.name: Alleyway

description: You walk along the main road, which links the southern gates to the
city center.  People bustle about their business here, completely
oblivious to the storm overhead.  A large structure can be seen rising
up above the rest of the city to the northeast.
14005.name: Main Street

description: {gYou follow the forest as it follows the walls of the palace.  The
vegetation only grows up the wall here, as opposed to where it has
consumed the city.  Rain falls down around you as it seems to pass
directly through the treetop cover.  {x
14283.name: {GThe Dense Forests of Darrowmere{x

description: You stand in a large entranceway, which leads to the tavern of the
inn.  A sign also says that the Inn itself is located adjacent to the
tavern.  People walk in and out, and the can hear the faint sound of
music coming from inside.
14193.name: {8Entrance to the {GG{greenston{Ge{8 Tavern{x

description: This alley reaches north and south, and seems fairly straight.  The
nearby buildings reach far above your head, and each one has a lantern
posted on its wall.  Voices can be heard in all directions, as the
cityfolk go about their business in this storm.
14196.name: Well Lit Alleyway

description: You are walking through the guild square, which houses all the
guilds in which to practice and train.  These parts of the square seem
to be a place to fight and hone your skills, as there are some weak
looking monsters around here.
14201.name: Guild Square

description: You walk down a very narrow alley, where there is very little
light.  Shadows creep around you, and the rain continues to fall down
from overhead.  This alley continues to the north and south.
14325.name: Dimly lit Alley

description: This road follows the southern wall, with a guard tower at either
end.  To the west lie the southern gates, and north the city expands
before your eyes.  One particular building stands out above the rest
of the city, which may show its importance.
14079.name: Along the Southern Wall

description: You are walking along the northern wall road.  The wall itself is
made of a fine brick, and must be at least three feet thick.  It's
fairly high as well.  The sound of trade and bartering can be heard
coming from the rest of the city.
14032.name: Along the Northern Wall

description: You walk along the main street, which runs east and west.  Buildings line
the road, with people bustling in and out.  The brick street continues east
and west.
14054.name: Main Street

description: You have entered a large bedroom, where guests to this mansion can
stay.  There is a bed and a chest of drawers here, along with a huge
rug covering the floor.  A window to the east has rain streaking down
it.
14259.name: Guest Quarters

description: The road expands before you, as you near the City Center to the
south, and the gates to the north.  The wind blows softly, and small
droplets of rain fall carefully to the ground.  To the east you can
see a tall structure standing high above the rest of the city.
14014.name: Northern Main Street

description: You have almost reached the southern gates of Darrowmere.  The
forest is all grown up around you, and the entire valley seems to
tower over you.  You can't imagine how you made it down those walls in
one piece.
14380.name: Forest Pathway

description: As you begin your decent into this maw of blackness, the cold wind
picks up, and chills you to the bone.  You can only see a few feet of
the staircase below you.  The sounds of something flying around you
can be heard, and you begin to wonder what fiends could be here with
you.
14408.name: Staircase to Oblivion

description: You are walking down a narrow hallway, which is very dark and
quiet.  Few lanterns cover the walls, making this a very eerie place
to be.  You can hear faint moans from below you, and wonder what it
is.
14290.name: Hallway in the Mansion

description: You are travelling along the north south western wall road.  At
either end lies a guard tower, and directly to the north lie the
western gates.  Buildings line the eastern side of this road, and the
wall is to the west.
14064.name: Along the Western Wall

description: The stairwell leads up to the third floor.  The stairs are solid grey
slate, intricately carved to show the great craftmanship of the architect.
A large stone banister escorts the stairs up to the next floor.
14101.name: Stairwell

description: You are walking down a well lit alleyway, that reaches into the
dense parts of Darrowmere.  Thunder and lightning strikes can be heard
from above, as the rain pours down around you.  This alley reaches
north and south.
14197.name: Well Lit Alleyway

description: You stand in a large room of this morgue.  It seems that this room
is where bodies are examined to determine the cause of their demise.
The walls are floor are all white, and look very sterile.
14288.name: City Morgue

description: You have entered a large training room in the guild.  Here the
various members of the guild can hone their fighting skills.  The only
apparent exit is back north through the door.
14188.name: {8Shadow Guild{x Training Room

description: You stand in the deep, dark Sewers of Darrowmere.  Here the law
cannot reach, nor can the light.  All around you the sound of dripping
water can be heard as the city above gets rained upon.  Slight shadows
are cast about the room, from the faint light that allows you to see
around.
14136.name: Sewers of Darrowmere

description: The street leads east and west, practically cutting the city into halves.
The cobblestones beneath your feet cover the entire road.  Off in the
distance a large building can be seen.  It's almost rectangular, but gets
pyramidical towards the top.
14051.name: Western Main Street

description: You walk along a wide street, consisting mostly of a fine stone.  The
wind blows through your hair along with a soft touch of rain.  To the
northeast lies a giant building, and northward the city limits can be seen.
14010.name: Main Street

description: You stand in the northeastern corner of the guild square.  Others
like yourself walk around here, fighting with the monsters and honing
their skills.  Sounds of battle can be heard all around you.
14216.name: Northeast Corner of Guild Square

description: You have entered a large stock room, which supplies the entire
guild.  Here the members of the guild can get necessary items to help
them with their jobs.  The only exit is back south, through the door.
14190.name: {8Shadow Guild{x Stock Room

description: You are walking down a small alleyway, with buildings looming over
your head.  The alley is lit from laterns which hang on the sides of
these buildings.  There is a sign to the north that reads:
'{gApothecary{x'.
14148.name: Narrow Alleyway

description: You round the final bend on the tower, and see a vast platform to
the south.  You begin to wonder what a platform is doing up here...
It seems like a large airship pad.  You think there's more to this
city thah what meets the eye.
14404.name: On the Balcony

description: You have entered a once beautiful building, now overrun with plant
life.  The eastern wall is completely broken through, where tree limbs
and roots have grown in.  The floors and walls are covered in moss,
and a small staircase leading up is still almost in tact.
14301.name: Inside a Crumbled Building

description: You stand at a large opening make completely of a fine natural
mithril.  The green stone walls of this cavern lead deep into the
surface of the planet, and stretch toward who knows what.
14356.name: Entrance to the Mithril Caves

description: You are scaling down a massive rock wall, which is covered with
forest.  As you look down, the valley overwhelms you with its shear
size.  It looks like an awfully long drop to the bottom.
14368.name: The Descent to Darrowmere

description: This road has almost reached its end to the south, but expands and
lengthens to your north.  Guard towers lie at both ends of this road.
The sounds of the city can be heard very easily here, along with the
noises from the outside.
14063.name: Along the Western Wall

description: The hallway reaches farther down the palace, with a few side hallways
branching off.  The jade walls reflect the light in the room, creating a
wonderful spectrum of light in front of you.  There is a slight noise coming
from above, probably others in the higher floors.
14096.name: {@J{2ade Hallwa{@y{x

description: You are walking along the eastern wall road.  Buildings line this
road opposite of the wall, and those buildings are made of a fine
green stone.  Sounds of the city and outside can be heard, and the
storm overhead continues to carry on, without showing any signs of
stopping.
14023.name: Along the Eastern Wall

description: You stand in a small entranceway, leading to a fairly large house.
There is a rough carpet before the house, to wipe your feet and not
carry the rain and dirt in with you.
14306.name: Entrance to the Whore House

description: {8You walk inside the basement that lies below the mansion.
Footsteps can be heard all around you, and you wonder what they could
be from.  Dripping water can be heard, which is most likely a
by-product of the storm above ground.  {x
14296.name: {MBasement of the Mansion{x

description: You have entered a large room, containing modest furniture for
living.  There is a large window facing south, with water pouring down
it on the outside.  The only exit from here is back north.
14224.name: Guest Quarters

description: The buildings on your sides begin to grow closer together, as the city
becomes more dense.  The rain is falling steadily, giving the green stone
walls a certain glimmer.  A few doors are on the adjacent buildings.
14129.name: Alleyway

description: You stand in the middle of a large square, but altogether run-down.
This is the center of this particular section of the Darrowmere slums.
A large building is to the west, and pathways lead in the other
directions.
14316.name: Slums Square

description: The crossroads of the square intersect here.  The main road runs east and
west, and the common square lies north and south.  The slight rumble of
conversation fills the air, as people trade and barter with the local shops.
14055.name: Common Square

description: You have reached the southwest corner of the wall, where the road
turns from south to east.  A guard tower looms overhead, and the vast
city can be easily seen to the northeast.  You are sheltered from the
constantly falling rain here.
14062.name: Southwest Corner of the Wall

description: You stand at a sharp bend in the alley.  Tall buildings line the
streets, and each one has a few lanterns hanging on it, to light your
way.  The rain pours down, and creates a thin coating over the green
stone of the buildings.
14157.name: Narrow Alleyway

14091.name: The little biznitch~

14103.name: A forest lizard~

14104.room_name: {3A Drider {GW{gar{7r{gio{Gr{3 scans the forest for enemies.{x
14104.name: The drider warrior~

14106.name: The umbrella seller~

14107.room_name: A merchant walks the streets searching for a sale.
14107.name: The merchant~

14108.room_name: A Bounty Hunter looks for his next target.
